LanguageData.SP_WeaveApparelHappy.stages.0.label: apparel made from aries{0}
LanguageData.SP_WeaveApparelHappy.stages.0.descriptio: I'm wearing clothes made from aries. It's so soft, I feel like I'm surrounded by a cloud.
